      How often this worker should heartbeat to the supervisor.

      Fields in org.apache.storm.hdfs.spout with annotations of type ConfigValidationAnnotations.IsInteger 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String Configs.COMMIT_FREQ_COUNT
      Deprecated. 
      please use HdfsSpout.setCommitFrequencyCount(int)
      static String Configs.COMMIT_FREQ_SEC
      Deprecated. 
      please use HdfsSpout.setCommitFrequencySec(int)
      static String Configs.LOCK_TIMEOUT
      Deprecated. 
      please use HdfsSpout.setLockTimeoutSec(int)
      static String Configs.MAX_OUTSTANDING
      Deprecated. 
      please use HdfsSpout.setMaxOutstanding(int)
